channel.title: [317]delta based- is it possible to make a command like this?
channel.description:
i was wondering if it is possible to make a command that makes everyone online open to a specific website
for example if i were to do "::open www.moparisthebest.com/smf" when i was online, everyones browser that is online would open up to that website?

item.title: [317]delta based- is it possible to make a command like this?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“bowzer, post:1, topic:367984”]i was wondering if it is possible to make a command that makes everyone online open to a specific website

for example if i were to do “::open www.moparisthebest.com/smf” when i was online, everyones browser that is online would open up to that website?[/quote]
he even said in the title he is using delta…

well im not sure, i guess that would be kind of like a command were you type and it forces ppl to do a certain emote, gfx, and say a certain thing, kind of like a force command, anyways, the closest i can direct you to this is:
make a button on your gui that redirects you to your desired website
setup an anno timer telling you what to do every certain amount of time you set

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


credits to deathchaos9 for this awesome delta tut

Read full topic
